decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 16 (Part iii) for the Machine Store part of planning permission ref. 59872/APP/2022/897 as defined on drawing number 14805TA-HGP-Block A&B-B1-A-008 Rev P1 only.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to partial discharge of condition 16 (Part iii - Verification Report - Contaminated Land for the Machine Store) of planning permission ref. 59872/APP/2022/897 Section 73 application to vary Condition 2 of application reference 59872/APP/2020/2517 dated 11-03-2021 (Section 73 application to vary Conditions 2, 3, 10 & 19 of application reference 59872/APP/2016/3454 (Mixed use redevelopment of the Pressing Plant, at The Old Vinyl Factory site, including the partial demolition of the Pressing Plant (formerly Apollo House), retention of front facade and part of the western facade of the Pressing Plant and construction of a cinema with retail, bar, restaurant, exhibition spaces and ancillary spaces and construction of the Machine Store, comprising 81 residential units, a health centre, bars/cafes, associated parking, landscaping, and access works, as amended by Non-Material Amendment application ref. 59872/APP/2020/867 for the removal of the external lift to the podium garden.
